summary: This module offers a comprehensive example for training a GraphSAGE model in an unsupervised setting using PyTorch Lightning. It includes a GraphSAGE neural network definition built on DGL and PyTorch, a negative sampling utility to generate contrastive samples, and a full training script that sets up data loading, model integration, loss computation, optimizer configuration, validation, and checkpointing.
business_intent: Provide developers and data scientists with a ready‑to‑run reference that demonstrates how to apply graph neural networks for representation learning on large graphs, enabling rapid prototyping, reproducible experiments, and integration of GraphSAGE into production pipelines.
